resources.string: The key parameters are not configured, and the connection to the server cannot be established ~
The publication topic has not yet been entered ~
No connection has been established with the MQTT server ~
No message has been entered yet ~
Disable camera permissions, you will not be able to use camera related functions~
Disable contact permissions, you will not be able to use contact related features~
Disabling location information permission will not get device location information~
Disable microphone permission, you will not be able to use the recording or call recording function~
Disabling phone permissions, you will not be able to use device phone related features~
Disable SMS permission, you will not be able to use device SMS related function~
Disable storage space permissions, you will not be able to use the file read and write or delete function ~
Note:If set to true the client and server will not maintain state across restarts of the client, the server or the connection.Otherwise false.
Note:If set to true, in the event that the connection is lost, the client will attempt to reconnect to the server.Otherwise false.
Nte:This value, measured in seconds, defines the maximum time interval the client will wait for the network connection to the MQTT server to be established.
Note:This value, measured in seconds, defines the maximum time interval between messages sent or received.
Note:The client id must be different with previous id.Which will cause connection lost.
Note:The topic that you subscribe or publish to the server.
Note:The topic that you subscribe or publish to the server.
Note:If set ture, all configurations which listed in the page will be cached.
Note:If ture, the cache will be loaded before establishing a connection, subscribing to a topic or sending a message.
